name: Triage Agent
shortDescription: A triage agent that redirects users to the pre-project agent when requested for websites, landing pages, or platforms.
fullDescription: This agent serves as a triage mechanism to identify requests for website creation, landing pages, or platform development. It ensures users are guided to the appropriate pre-project agent to handle their specific needs.
UseCases:
1. Redirecting users requesting the creation of websites or landing pages to the pre-project agent. 
2. Handling requests for platform development and ensuring proper guidance to relevant agents.
